Brutal_Swipe_Primal_Heal.help: Your Feral Might attacks while Primal form heal nearby allies for a small amount of health.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} heals {PlayerDest} for {Damage} points of health!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} heals you for {Damage} health!

Brutal_Swipe_Primal_Heal.help: Your Feral Might attacks while Primal form heal nearby allies for a small amount of health.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} heals {PlayerDest} for {Damage} points of health!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} heals you for {Damage} health!

Resistance.help: Primal Wolves are resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. They also have a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

Vicious_Bite.help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Vicious_Bite.shortHelp: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Vicious_Bite.targetHelp: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Maiming_Bite.help: The beast lunges and sinks their teeth into the victim before tearing viciously. Maiming Bite causes Moderate Lethal damage and reduces the target's movement speed moderately for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Maiming_Bite.targetHelp: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Menacing_Growl.help: The Wolf lets out a Menacing Growl intimidating nearby foes causing nearby foes to have their damage reduced slightly for a short time. Recharge: Very Long

Feral_Blow_Primal_Heal.help: Your Feral Might attacks while Primal form heal nearby allies for a small amount of health.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} heals {PlayerDest} for {Damage} points of health!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} heals you for {Damage} health!

Feral_Blow_Primal_Heal.help: Your Feral Might attacks while Primal form heal nearby allies for a small amount of health.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} heals {PlayerDest} for {Damage} points of health!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} heals you for {Damage} health!

Feral_Blow_Hunter.help: You lash out at a nearby foe dealing Light damage. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a tiny amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the target's defense. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a small chance to stun. This power builds 1 Primal Energy. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Feral_Blow_Hunter.targetHelp: Your defense has been reduced by the Hunter's Feral Blow.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Vicious_Strike_Hunter.help: You strike a foe dealing Moderate damage. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a small amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the target's damage resistance. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a fair chance to stun. This power builds 1 primal energy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Vicious_Strike_Hunter.targetHelp: Your damage resistance has been reduced by the Hunter's Vicious Strike!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Brutal_Swipe_Hunter.help: You lash out at nearby foes in a single broad strike hitting up to 5 enemies in a cone in front of you. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a fair amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the targets' defense. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a good chance to stun. Brutal Swipe builds 1 Primal Energy. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Brutal_Swipe_Hunter.targetHelp: Your defense has been reduced by the Hunter's Brutal Swipe!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Primal_Strike_Hunter.help: You strike your foe will the primal forces of nature to deal Superior damage. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a good amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the target's damage slightly. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a high chance to stun. This power builds 1 primal energy. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Primal_Strike_Hunter.targetHelp: Your damage has been reduced by the Hunter's Primal Strike!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Upheaval_Hunter.help: You channel the forces of nature and release them shattering the earth beneath you sending shards of stone and debris out at nearby foes causing high damage and potentially knocking them down. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a large amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the targets' resistance slightly. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a high chance to stun. Upheaval will deal high damage if the user has no Primal Energy, however it will deal additional damage for each charge of Primal Energies the user owns. Upheaval consumes all Primal Energies. Damage: Special, Recharge: Long
Upheaval_Hunter.shortHelp: PBAoE, Special DMG, Foe Knockdown, -All Primal Energy
Upheaval_Hunter.targetHelp: Your damage resistance has been reduced by the Hunter's Upheaval!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Savage_Blow_Hunter.help: Before delivering an absolutely punishing blow you concentrate and channel the forces of nature into your strike to cause Extreme damage. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a moderate amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and significantly reduce the target's damage. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause moderate lethal damage over time and stun the target. This power builds 2 primal energy. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Savage_Blow_Hunter.targetHelp: Your damage has been reduced by the Hunter's Savage Blow!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Primal_Howl_Hunter.help: The Primalist lets out a Primal Howl with varying effects depending on their current form. In primal form, you will boost their recovery and regeneration significantly for a good while. In Hunter Form you will reduce the damage and damage resistance of nearby foes. Primal Howl builds 3 Primal Energy. Primal Howl may not be used in Prowler Form. Recharge: Very Long
Primal_Howl_Hunter.shortHelp: PBAoE Special, Requires Primal or Hunter Form
Primal_Howl_Hunter.attackerHit: You boost the recovery and regeneration rate of nearby allies!
Primal_Howl_Hunter.victimHit: Your regeneration and recovery rate is temporarily increased by the Primal Howl.

In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a tiny amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the target's defense. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a small chance to stun. This power builds 1 Primal Energy. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast

Upheaval_Prowler.help: You channel the forces of nature and release them shattering the earth beneath you sending shards of stone and debris out at nearby foes causing high damage and potentially knocking them down. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a large amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the targets' resistance slightly. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a high chance to stun. Upheaval will deal high damage if the user has no Primal Energy, however it will deal additional damage for each charge of Primal Energies the user owns. Upheaval consumes all Primal Energies. Damage: Special, Recharge: Long
Upheaval_Prowler.shortHelp: PBAoE, Special DMG, Foe Knockdown, -All Primal Energy
Upheaval_Prowler.targetHelp: You've been stunned by the Prowler's Upheaval and are suffering damage over time!

Savage_Blow_Prowler.help: Before delivering an absolutely punishing blow you concentrate and channel the forces of nature into your strike to cause Extreme damage. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a moderate amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and significantly reduce the target's damage. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause moderate lethal damage over time and stun the target. This power builds 2 primal energy. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Savage_Blow_Prowler.targetHelp: You've been stunned by the Prowler's Savage Blow and are suffering damage over time!
